item.title: Our students can use AI for their master's thesis - the policy
item.description: During my day job, I teach a number of computer science courses in the information engineering programme at Ghent University. The release of ChatGPT and GPT-4 has a large impact on our education because it can get grades of above 80% on most exams and can effortlessly write essays on complex subjects. Students are aware of this, and are thus increasingly using Large Language Models (LLMs) in their education for a number of tasks.
